title: List of all Android static  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android static  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Dali
repoList.description: Dali is an image blur library for Android. It contains several modules for static blurring, live blurring and animations.

repoList.name: codelab-library
repoList.description: Android library that helps using static application context.

repoList.name: android-staticmap
repoList.description: A small library to add Google static maps to your Android app

repoList.name: piri
repoList.description: Piri is a lightweight annotation processing library that generates static factory methods for your Activities and Fragments.

repoList.name: android-opencv-example
repoList.description: Android MobileNet object detection example with openCV 4.2 static link library.

repoList.name: android-gradle-java-multi-module-template
repoList.description: Static analysis tools: PMD, Findbugs, Checkstyle, Lint and Jacoco on multi module build with an Android app module, Android library module and a Java module

repoList.name: GyroView
repoList.description: A simple Android library for orienting views right-side up in an Activity with static orientation.

repoList.name: gMaps-Library
repoList.description: A simple android library to get a direction rendered on a Google Static Maps from an array of locations.

repoList.name: Kickback
repoList.description: :package: This Android library helps to manage static data more structurally.

repoList.name: markii
repoList.description: Android/Java Static Analysis Library
